Articles.Content:
Apparently, while I'm down, I'm not 100% out. Seems I can stress the machine at least a wee little bit before my hardware begins to fail yet again. Don't have a new machine yet, but the office rumor is we've got a nice bonus coming. Maybe then.

Until then? I thought I'd make something I can share.

Work in progress. Details subject to change.

Despite its small, the Whackness can be felt on this one

Dont despair man! Cheers!

I say we start a fundraiser to get whackjob the best computer possible, that can run a 5000000 part ship crash like nothing!

(Is that even possible?)
I hope you dock all 3 arkingthaads together and go MINE THE HEART OF JOOL

I say we start a fundraiser to get whackjob the best computer possible

Kickstarter?
